name: CLARITY_ECP
description: The CLARITY_ECP table contains summary information about the pricing contracts billing system uses to adjudicate the price of a charge.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pricing contract record.

columns.name: CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pricing contract.

columns.name: SELFPAY_WO_PROC_ID
columns.description: The Self-pay Write-Off procedure code that the system uses when the charge being written off has no insurance. This item is only applicable when the contract has a type of Write-off, and uses an insurance write-off code.
